gift_id = #{giftId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where content_id = #{contentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update game_gift_content set gift_id = #{giftId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item_type = #{itemType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item_quantity = #{itemQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where content_id = #{contentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
